results.content:
It was good material for someone who already know the basic of HTML/CSS/JS.
But instead of just sliders, it could be better if you could show the live demo more.

18. Dropdown section
Could be explained with more details.
I had to add jQuery file in ordered to make this work but the video did not explain so I didn't understand why it wasn't working at first.
It'll be great if you could show from adding the script as well. 

28. nav-tabs,nav-pills
No explanation on why dropdown did not work.

To know the basic of Bootstrap, this video isn't bad.
results.content_html:
It was good material for someone who already know the basic of HTML/CSS/JS.
But instead of just sliders, it could be better if you could show the live demo more.

18. Dropdown section
Could be explained with more details.
I had to add jQuery file in ordered to make this work but the video did not explain so I didn't understand why it wasn't working at first.
It'll be great if you could show from adding the script as well.

28. nav-tabs,nav-pills
No explanation on why dropdown did not work.

To know the basic of Bootstrap, this video isn't bad.
